name: Fishing Simulator 2D
description:
This game is still in development, stick around for the full release which would include more game functions such as power-ups!

Hello there!
Silent Earth Games presents, Fishing Simulator 2D, an RNG-based fishing game!

Sell your fish to the Seafood store to get coins, which you can use to buy power-ups (in development) that help you catch more fish!

JOIN OUR DISCORD SERVER: https://discord.gg/eSV5bav7nm
